scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Cinéma vérité documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain texture, desaturated color grade with muted grays and cool blue undertones, authentic urban realism aesthetic with high contrast shadows, handheld documentary feel

Scene Description: A rush-hour subway platform bathed in harsh fluorescent lighting. In the center of the chaotic flow, an early 30s professional with mixed heritage features, warm olive skin, and medium-length dark brown disheveled hair stands completely still amid the surging crowd. Wearing a charcoal gray blazer over white t-shirt and dark indigo jeans, hands buried in pockets, shoulders slightly slouched. Their distant, unfocused eyes stare through the crowd as hundreds of commuters rush past in blurred motion—briefcases swinging, phones glowing, everyone moving with urgent purpose. The protagonist remains motionless, an island of disconnection in a river of movement. Subway signage, yellow caution lines, and grimy platform tiles create the institutional urban backdrop. Visible tension in their jaw, subtle shadows under eyes suggesting fatigue.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium shot at eye level, slightly off-center with protagonist in middle third, crowd filling frame edges
Camera motion: Subtle handheld sway, mimicking observer's stance, creating documentary intimacy while maintaining focus on still subject
Lighting: Harsh overhead fluorescent lights casting unflattering shadows, cool blue-white color temperature creating sterile institutional atmosphere, high contrast between lit and shadowed areas
Mood: Isolated and disconnected, contemplative loneliness amid chaos, urban alienation and existential distance

Actions:
- 0-2 seconds: Commuters stream past protagonist in rapid motion blur while protagonist stands frozen, creating stark contrast
- 2-4 seconds: Protagonist's eyes slowly blink, the only movement, while crowd continues surging around them
- 4-6 seconds: A businessman brushes past their shoulder, they barely register it, gaze remaining distant
- 6-8 seconds: Camera holds steady as protagonist's expression reads hollow—watching life happen to others while standing behind invisible glass
scenes.audio_background: Minimalist ambient soundscape, low-frequency rumble of distant subway trains, echoing footsteps creating rhythmic percussion, sparse droning synth pad in minor key, tempo slow at 60 BPM, creating contemplative and isolating atmosphere, industrial urban texture with hollow reverb

Cinéma vérité documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain texture, desaturated color grade with muted grays and cool blue undertones, authentic urban realism aesthetic with high contrast shadows. Medium shot at eye level, slightly off-center composition. Early 30s professional person with mixed heritage features, warm olive medium skin tone, natural skin texture with visible pores, medium-length dark brown disheveled hair, wearing charcoal gray blazer over white t-shirt and dark indigo jeans. Hands in pockets, shoulders slightly slouched, distant unfocused eyes staring through space. Standing completely still in center of frame while blurred commuters rush past on both sides in motion. Harsh overhead fluorescent lighting casting unflattering shadows, cool blue-white institutional color temperature. Subway platform tiles, yellow caution lines, signage visible in background. Isolated and disconnected mood, contemplative loneliness amid chaos. Subtle handheld documentary feel. Professional cinematography, 8K detail, authentic documentary photography style, real person in real environment, natural skin detail and texture, realistic depth of field with protagonist sharp and crowd motion-blurred

visual_effects.name: Mystification
visual_effects.description: Mysterious smoke swirls around enigmatic sunglasses. Secretive and entrancing
visual_effects.timing: 6-8 seconds, subtle smoke beginning to materialize at edges of frame, hinting at transformation to come

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Cinematic magical realism, shot on digital cinema camera with pristine clarity and subtle film grain, rich color grade transitioning from cool subway blues to warm golden amber tones, dreamlike yet tangible aesthetic blending documentary realism with impossible elements, professional commercial cinematography

Scene Description: Against the blurred subway platform backdrop (now defocused and secondary), a pair of SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses materializes in midair at eye level, suspended impossibly in space. The frames feature iconic teardrop-shaped lenses with double bridge design, thin polished gold metal construction gleaming with premium craftsmanship. Most striking: the lenses emit an ethereal, soft golden-white glow from within—not a surface reflection but an impossible internal luminescence, as if the glasses contain captured sunlight. The glow pulses gently like a heartbeat, creating a mesmerizing halo effect around the entire frame. Gradient tint visible within lenses from golden amber at top to subtle gray at bottom. Premium details visible: riveted hinges, adjustable nose pads, temple tips with subtle engraving. The floating glasses rotate slowly, showing all angles while maintaining the mysterious inner radiance. Background commuters continue moving in soft focus, unaware of this impossible moment.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Close-up centered on floating sunglasses, frame filling middle two-thirds of composition with soft-focus platform visible behind
Camera motion: Slow orbital dolly circling the suspended glasses, smooth 180-degree arc from left to right over 8 seconds, showcasing all angles
Lighting: Ethereal glow emanating from within the lenses creates primary light source, casting soft golden illumination on surrounding air particles, ambient cool fluorescent fill from platform, creating magical contrast between impossible warm glow and mundane cool environment
Mood: Impossible and irresistible, mystical invitation, moment of choice suspended in time, captivating and transformative

Actions:
- 0-2 seconds: Glasses fade into existence from nothing, internal glow building from faint to radiant
- 2-4 seconds: Full materialization complete, glasses float with gentle bobbing motion as if weightless, glow pulsing stronger
- 4-6 seconds: Slow rotation begins, showing side profile and gold temple arms, inner light creating prismatic effects
- 6-8 seconds: Front view returns as camera completes arc, glow reaches peak intensity, creating irresistible pull
scenes.audio_background: Ethereal cinematic soundscape, shimmering glass-like tones layered with warm synthesizer pads, subtle angelic choir texture in background, building crescendo from soft to medium intensity, tempo free-flowing at 80 BPM, creating sense of magic and invitation, crystalline high frequencies mixed with warm low frequencies, reverb-drenched atmosphere suggesting otherworldly transformation
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (warm, intimate, slightly mysterious voice with gentle authority): Sometimes the light finds you. Sometimes you have to reach for it.

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Cinematic transformation sequence, shot on digital cinema camera with pristine clarity and organic film grain, dynamic color grade shifting from cool desaturated tones to warm vibrant golden hues as transformation occurs, commercial cinematography blending realism with aspirational energy, professional beauty lighting emerging

Scene Description: The same early 30s professional with mixed heritage features and warm olive skin now enters frame from left side, initially maintaining their disconnected posture—shoulders slightly slouched, distant expression. Their hand rises into frame, fingers extending toward the floating golden-glowing SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses suspended at eye level. The moment fingers make contact with the polished gold temples, everything shifts. As the glasses slide onto their face, their entire physical presence transforms: shoulders roll back and square, spine elongates, jaw unclenches and defines, eyes sharpen with sudden clarity and focus visible even behind the gradient lenses. The charcoal gray blazer suddenly sits perfectly on now-confident shoulders. Hair appears intentionally styled without changing. The polarized lenses now show natural reflections instead of inner glow, catching the emerging golden hour light. Their expression evolves from hollow to magnetic—subtle confident smile, direct gaze that commands attention. The transformation is complete: same person, same clothes, entirely different energy. Background subway platform begins warming in color temperature, suggesting shift from mundane to possibility.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium close-up transitioning to close-up, starting at chest level and slowly pushing in to face/sunglasses level as transformation occurs
Camera motion: Smooth push-in dolly, accelerating slightly during key transformation moment (4-6 seconds), creating intimacy and emphasis on change
Lighting: Begins with cool fluorescent platform lighting, transitions to warm golden hour quality emerging from right side as transformation completes, creating dimensional modeling on face, soft rim light appearing on shoulders, lenses catching warm highlights
Mood: Transformative and empowering, moment of remembering one's power, shift from disconnection to magnetic confidence, pivotal awakening

Actions:
- 0-2 seconds: Hand enters frame from below, reaching deliberately toward floating glasses, protagonist's face entering left side of frame with pre-transformation posture
- 2-4 seconds: Fingers grasp gold temple arms, glasses begin moving toward face, first subtle shift in posture begins—shoulders starting to square
- 4-6 seconds: Glasses slide onto face, immediate physical transformation—shoulders back, spine straight, jaw unclenching, eyes sharpening with clarity, inner glow fading as real-world reflections appear in lenses
- 6-8 seconds: Transformation complete, protagonist now radiating confidence, subtle smile emerging, gaze direct and magnetic, warm golden light fully illuminating their new presence
scenes.audio_background: Epic cinematic transformation score, building from minimal piano notes to full orchestral swell, strings section rising in crescendo, subtle electronic pulse underlying organic instruments, tempo accelerating from 70 to 100 BPM during transformation moment, triumphant yet intimate energy, warm brass accents at climax, creating sense of personal victory and awakening

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Surreal kaleidoscopic cinema, shot on digital cinema camera with impossibly sharp clarity and dreamlike grain texture, dynamic color grading cycling through multiple environments—desert gold, ocean blue, aurora green-purple, all layered and bleeding into each other, commercial cinematography meets experimental visual poetry, impossible physics aesthetic

Scene Description: Extreme close-up on the SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses worn by the now-confident protagonist with mixed heritage features and warm olive skin. The polarized gradient lenses become portals to impossible layered realities. Within the left lens: a desert highway liquefies and flows like water, asphalt and heat waves merging into ocean depths where sunlight penetrates blue-green water with rays of light. Within the right lens: a rooftop gathering of silhouetted friends folds and inverts into aurora-lit mountain peaks with Northern Lights cascading down in ribbons of green and purple. The reflections don't follow normal physics—they stack, overlap, and bleed into each other like double exposures. Through the lenses, multiple worlds exist simultaneously: urban skylines melt into tropical beaches, snowcapped peaks dissolve into starry desert nights. The gold metal frames remain solid and real, anchoring the impossible visions. Protagonist's confident expression visible in frame edges—slight smile, unwavering gaze. Each lens shows 3-4 distinct environments layered within its polarized surface, all crystal clear through the premium optics.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Extreme close-up on sunglasses, lenses filling 70% of frame with portions of face visible at edges, frontal angle showing both lenses equally
Camera motion: Subtle slow zoom into lenses, creating hypnotic draw into the layered worlds, movement smooth and dream-like
Lighting: Multiple light sources reflecting the layered environments—warm desert sun, cool ocean blue, ethereal aurora glow, golden hour amber—all simultaneously present and shifting across lens surfaces, creating prismatic color play on gold frames
Mood: Mind-expanding and infinite, sense of limitless possibility and perspective, surreal confidence, worlds within worlds, never hiding from any reality

Actions:
- 0-2 seconds: Camera establishes extreme close-up on lenses, first environment layers becoming visible—desert highway beginning to liquify
- 2-4 seconds: Ocean depths materialize overlapping highway, rooftop scene folds into mountain peaks, layers increasing in complexity
- 4-6 seconds: Full surreal layering achieved—4-5 distinct environments visible within each lens, all bleeding and stacking impossibly, aurora colors dancing across surfaces
- 6-8 seconds: All environments swirl and converge, protagonist's unwavering gaze visible through the chaos, suggesting they see and embrace all perspectives simultaneously
scenes.audio_background: Experimental electronic soundscape with world music elements, layered audio reflecting visual concept—desert winds mixing with ocean waves mixing with crowd chatter mixing with mountain silence, synthesizers creating swirling pad textures that shift through multiple tonal centers, tempo fluid between 90-110 BPM, tabla drums mixed with electronic beats, creating sense of multiple realities coexisting, rich stereo field with sounds panning and layering like the visuals, crescendo building to overwhelming sensory experience
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (confident, knowing voice with slight echo suggesting vast space): Through the right lens, you don't just see the world. You see every world you've earned the right to walk through.
scenes.first_frame_image_prompt: Hyper-realistic, photorealistic, ultra-realistic extreme close-up photograph of aviator sunglasses with impossible reflections. Surreal kaleidoscopic cinema style, shot on digital cinema camera with impossibly sharp clarity and dreamlike grain texture, dynamic color grading with desert gold, ocean blue, and aurora purple-green tones all layered together. Extreme close-up frontal angle with sunglasses lenses filling 70% of frame. Classic SunVue Aviator sunglasses with polished gold metal frames and gradient polarized lenses. Within lenses: surreal layered environments—desert highway liquifying into ocean depths with light rays, rooftop silhouettes folding into aurora-lit mountain peaks, multiple worlds stacked and overlapping impossibly within the glass. Double exposure effect with 3-4 distinct environments visible in each lens simultaneously. Premium polarized optics showing crystalline clarity despite impossible reflections. Portions of early 30s person's face visible at frame edges—warm olive skin tone with natural texture, confident slight smile, unwavering sharp gaze. Gold frames catching multiple light sources—warm sun, cool ocean blue, ethereal aurora glow. Professional commercial cinematography meets experimental visual poetry. Mind-expanding and infinite mood, limitless possibility. Multiple overlapping color temperatures, prismatic light play. 8K detail, authentic materials with surreal impossible content, realistic metal texture with dreamlike reflections, documentary precision meets fantasy, natural skin detail with supernatural visual experience, professional color grading showing environment layer blending

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Premium commercial hero shot, shot on digital cinema camera with pristine optical clarity and subtle organic grain, rich warm golden hour color grade with amber and honey tones, high-contrast dramatic lighting, professional eyewear advertising aesthetic with aspirational energy, cinematic beauty photography

Scene Description: Extreme close-up on the early 30s protagonist with mixed heritage features, warm olive skin with visible natural texture. Their face fills the frame, now radiating complete confidence and magnetic presence. The SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses sit perfectly on their face—polished gold metal frames gleaming, teardrop-shaped gradient lenses reflecting the world with polarized precision. The critical moment: a sun flare enters from the right side of frame, catching the gold temples and lens edges, creating prismatic light rays that streak across the frame horizontally. All the layered reflections from Scene 4 converge and collapse into one single, unwavering direct gaze forward—through the lenses, protagonist's eyes are sharp, focused, powerful. Subtle confident smile plays at corners of their mouth. Hair appears perfectly intentionally styled, charcoal blazer sits impeccably on squared shoulders visible at frame bottom. As sun flare reaches peak intensity (6-7 sec), onscreen text materializes over the lower third in clean modern sans-serif font: 'SunVue. Polarized precision. Never Hide.' Background is soft-focus golden amber, suggesting sunset or transformation of the mundane subway into something elevated. Every detail of the frames is showcased: riveted hinges, premium materials, optical perfection.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Extreme close-up portrait, face and sunglasses filling entire frame, frontal angle with slight 5-degree tilt for dynamic energy
Camera motion: Locked static on tripod for hero product moment, creating iconic stillness and power
Lighting: Golden hour sun from right side creating dramatic rim light on face and frames, key light from slightly left creating dimensional modeling, sun flare entering frame at 5-6 seconds with optical lens artifacts, warm amber fill light maintaining rich skin tones, high contrast ratio emphasizing frame details
Mood: Triumphant and iconic, ultimate confidence and self-possession, aspirational yet attainable, powerful culmination, never hiding

Actions:
- 0-2 seconds: Static hero shot established, protagonist's direct gaze through lenses unwavering and magnetic, slight ambient movement in hair
- 2-4 seconds: Layered reflections from previous scene fade from lenses, converging into single clear perspective
- 4-6 seconds: Sun flare begins entering right side of frame, catching gold frame edges
- 6-7 seconds: Sun flare reaches peak intensity, creating dramatic prismatic rays across frame, text materializes: 'SunVue. Polarized precision. Never Hide.'
- 7-8 seconds: Hold on final image with text, protagonist's confident expression sealed, frames gleaming in golden light
scenes.audio_background: Triumphant cinematic finale score, full orchestral arrangement with soaring strings, confident brass fanfare, subtle electronic pulse maintaining modern edge, building to powerful sustained final chord, tempo solid at 100 BPM, creating sense of arrival and achievement, warm rich production with clarity and depth, premium advertising sound, inspirational and victorious energy with intimate confidence
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (powerful, assured voice with quiet strength): SunVue. Polarized precision. Never Hide.
